Description: Foot and lower wall of East Greek pottery bowl; disc foot with central hollow. Glaze fired brown. Interior: five-petal rosette; exterior glazed; underside reserved, with post-firing inscription.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 461)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.174)
